name: Tractor Supply Company
description: Tractor Supply Company is the largest rural lifestyle retail store chain in the United States, offering a wide range of products for farmers, ranchers, and rural homeowners. Founded in 1938, the company has grown from a small tractor parts store to a major retailer of agricultural products, pet supplies, lawn and garden equipment, and home improvement items. With more than 2,000 stores across the country, Tractor Supply aims to provide customers with quality products and exceptional service. The company's product assortment includes livestock feed, fencing, tools, hardware, and outdoor living items, catering to the needs of those who live a rural lifestyle. Tractor Supply also emphasizes community engagement and supports local agriculture and rural communities through various initiatives. The company has a commitment to sustainability and responsible sourcing, ensuring that its operations and products meet the highest environmental standards. With a vision to be the most trusted partner for the rural lifestyle, Tractor Supply continues to expand its offerings and enhance its customer experience through digital innovation and in-store services.

seo.meta_title: Tractor Supply Company | Your Partner for the Rural Lifestyle
seo.meta_description: Explore Tractor Supply Company, the largest rural lifestyle retailer in the U.S. Discover a wide range of products for farming, ranching, and outdoor living.

faq.question: What does Tractor Supply Company sell?
faq.answer: Tractor Supply Company sells products for agriculture, pet supplies, lawn and garden, tools, and hardware.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Tractor Supply Company?
faq.answer: Hal Lawton is the CEO of Tractor Supply Company.

faq.question: Where is Tractor Supply Company headquartered?
faq.answer: Tractor Supply Company is headquartered in Brentwood, Tennessee, USA.

faq.question: When was Tractor Supply Company founded?
faq.answer: Tractor Supply Company was founded in 1938.
